sentence.Network_en: Greenpeace managed to assemble enough boats to waylay the ship at sea.
sentence.Network_cn: 绿色和平组织设法聚集起足够数量的小船在海上拦截该船。

sentence.Network_en: She lingered outside the theater to waylay him after the show.
sentence.Network_cn: 她在戏院外面徘徊想在演出之后拦住他说话.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 以w开头的英语英文单词 ... wayfaring 旅行的 waylay 埋伏,伏击 wayside 路旁.
小学英语不规则过去式_百度知道 ... wake 醒来 waylay 埋伏 wear 穿着.
waylaid 埋伏waylay 拦截wayleave 通行权
2012年自考英语必记单词词组十四 - 自考365... ... inventor n. 发明者，创造者 waylay vt. 伏击；拦住……问讯 painter n. 漆工；画家.

entry.def: If someone waylays you, they stop you when you are going somewhere, for example in order to talk to you, to steal something from you, or to attack you.

example.ex: She was forever waylaying him in odd holes and corners of the hotel...
example.tran: 她总是在酒店的犄角旮旯里截住他。

example.ex: The trucks are being waylaid by bandits...

auth_sentence.content: Could I waylay some knight...mounted on an ambling pad?
auth_sentence.res_content: Could I waylay some knight...mounted on an ambling pad?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Could I waylay some knight...mounted on an ambling pad?

auth_sentence.content: Problems of his family to waylay and beset him.
auth_sentence.res_content: Problems of his family to waylay and beset him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Problems of his family to waylay and beset him.

auth_sentence.content: The two men...would waylay the magistrate and murder him.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The two men...would waylay the magistrate and murder him.
